import "./topbar.css" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useContext } from "react"; import { Context } from "../../context/Context"; export default function TopBar() { let { user, dispatch } = useContext(Context) const handleLogout = () => { dispatch({type: "LOGOUT"}) } return (
{user ? <> Home Write Settings Logout : <> Login Register }
) }
